caption:
Chelsea will have to pay a fee of £5M to Manchester United if they decide not to purchase Jadon Sancho permanently at the end of the season. 😳💵 

Chelsea loaned Sancho on a temporary basis with a buy obligation worth up to £25M, but Chelsea can now opt out for a set fee 👀

Jadon Sancho for Manchester United:
🏟️ Games: 83
🚀 Goals: 12
🎯 Assists: 6

Jadon Sancho for Chelsea:
🏟️ Games: 28
🚀 Goals: 2
🎯 Assists: 6

A reminder, Manchester United paid £73M for Jadon Sancho… 😳
